title: how to move the grid's row up and down using button up and button down only for angular + UI-Grid?
body:
I have two button to control the Ui-Grid grid's rows, one is move up, and the other is move down,

I want to move the selected row move up/down to the be/next row, when i click the move button,

I didn't find api document http://ui-grid.info/docs/#/tutorial/ , but not found any methods about that,

need some help , thanks!
